--- create_index.sql
create index foo_bar on foo (
  bar desc,
  baz asc,
)

--- AST
&ast.CreateIndex{
  Create:       0,
  Rparen:       53,
  Unique:       false,
  NullFiltered: false,
  IfNotExists:  false,
  Name:         &ast.FQN{
    Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 13,
      NameEnd: 20,
      Name:    "foo_bar",
    },
  },
  TableName: &ast.FQN{
    Schema: (*ast.Ident)(nil),
    Name:   &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 24,
      NameEnd: 27,
      Name:    "foo",
    },
  },
  Keys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 36,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 32,
        NameEnd: 35,
        Name:    "bar",
      },
      Dir: "DESC",
    },
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: 48,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 44,
        NameEnd: 47,
        Name:    "baz",
      },
      Dir: "ASC",
    },
  },
  Storing:      (*ast.Storing)(nil),
  InterleaveIn: (*ast.InterleaveIn)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE INDEX foo_bar ON foo (bar DESC, baz ASC)
